Note: Massive delay in media loading onto MR screen
Participant notices a slight rainbow glare and wonders if it’s because they are viewing screen mostly with 1 eye
Participant feels that mental fatigue will likely occur for them by end of session as screen primarily located on one side of MR glasses promotes a highly specific focal point
Participant notes that load time of videos is problematic, no option to pause or replay
Display dimensions are extra noticeable to the eye in comparison to a phone’s rectangular display with the MR glasses visually compressing contents on screen
Participant notices that they can mentally process videos more effortlessly likely due to accompanying audio compared to image instructions from Lego set task
When participant looks directly toward a light source with MR glasses display off, they notice a significant rainbow glare effect in the divots of the glass
